name: Albert Lee KING, Appellant v. PA. DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS, PA. Department of Probation and Parole, Appellees
name_abbreviation: King v. PA. Department of Corrections

parties: Albert Lee KING, Appellant v. PA. DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS, PA. Department of Probation and Parole, Appellees.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 29th day of September, 2010, the order of the Commonwealth Court is hereby AFFIRMED.
Jurisdiction relinquished.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
4 A.3d 154
Albert Lee KING, Appellant v. PA. DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS, PA. Department of Probation and Parole, Appellees.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Sept. 29, 2010.
